name: Minigolf Galaxy
description:
Join the Early Access version of Minigolf Galaxy and help us shape the future of minigolf gaming!

Minigolf Galaxy invites you to create your very own cosmic minigolf courses, engage in fun challenges, and embark on a stellar journey through the universe.



Jump into fast sessions with fellow players across the galaxy. Earn rewards in our real-time multiplayer and show the world who is the true minigolf champion while sharing a good laugh and exploring different courses crafted by players just like you.



Design minigolf courses where the possibilities are limited only by your imagination! Share your masterpieces with others and challenge them to epic galactic battles. Show your creativity - the sky's not the limit, it's just the beginning!



Discover techniques so unique, even aliens are taking notes. With power shots and curved balls, you'll find more ways to score Hole-in-Ones than there are stars in the Milky Way!



Connect with mini-golf enthusiasts and creators. Share your own course designs, exchange tips, and tricks, and rate the work of others. The best ones will be featured in official multiplayer matches!



Hold onto your golf hats on our intergalactic golf tour! Get ready as regular updates will arrive, expanding Minigolf Galaxy further and further!
